document_data.name: Cave bear
document_data.mainbody: '''Cave bears''' were large, ancient ill-tempered [[bear]]s that had adapted to life underground.
document_data.Description: Typical cave bears had coarse and dark hair.
document_data.Combat: Cave bears, much like [[polar bear]]s, used primarily their claws and powerful bite as weapons.
document_data.History: Sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]] of [[1485 DR]], a family of cave bears resided in one of the caverns of [[Deadstone Cleft]].

Ecology.Diet: Cave bears were typically known to eat subterranean [[lichen]] and blind fish.
Ecology.Habitats: Cave bears were known to inhabit the [[Savage Frontier]]
Ecology.Relationships:
Cave bears were considered [[favored animal|sacred animals]] to the followers of [[Clangeddin Silverbeard]], [[Geb]], [[Luthic]], and [[Uthgar]].{{Cite web enhancement/Deity Do's and Don'ts|10-15}}

The [[priest]]esses and [[shaman]]s of Luthic could summon cave bears to their aid and were often protected by several of the beasts.
